Neo Prop Realty

About Us

Approved by Board Of Valuer in April 2021, the company’s headquarter is located in PandanIndah Kuala Lumpur. Neo Prop Realty is very passionate in realizing the property owners’objectives by effectively and efficiently operating in both Real Estate and Building Managementwithin Malaysia and abroad. The firm is registered under the Board of Valuers, Appraisers, EstateAgents and Property Manager as a full fledge professional practice offering the real estateservices Agency and Property Management.
As part of the company’s missions to induce professionalism in Real Estate practice, Neo PropRealty has built its strategy around providing quality services and solutions to clients,understanding clients’ needs and go beyond the mere premise of basic professional service.With carefully selected and dedicated teams the company offers high-quality professional adviceand solutions across a comprehensive portfolio of property services. We strive to enrich the livesof Bumiputeras and all Malaysians for the prosperity of the nation.

Vision and Mission

Vision

To be the leader in Real Estate Industry, specializingin structuring Agency and Property Management.

Mission

To induce professionalism in real estate practice withwell-structured business model based on a holisticapproach using impactful methods.

Our Management Team

Principal/Founder

Sr. Rosniza Mohamed, a Degree holder in Estate Management (UiTM) is currently a certifiedRegistered Estate Agent and Property Management under the belt of the Board of Valuers,Appraisers, Estate Agents and Property Managers Malaysia. She has more than 17 years ofexperience in the property industry with hands-on experience, having worked in various localfirms. In 2004, her career was launched as an assistant valuer at Allied Group PropertyConsultants and the following year, she joined IM Global Consultants as a negotiator. In 2015,she was accredited with the Registered Estate Agent (REA) licence; in 2020, she has alsoofficially been awarded Property Management (PM) licence.

Rosniza Mohamed, previously with her team at IM Global Property Consultants had beenhelping the community to own properties, new or subsales before she’s inspired to spread herwings by incorporating Neo Prop Realty & Property Management. She has been activelyinvolved in government and developer projects in Kuala Lumpur and Selangor.

Rosniza has been an active member of Persatuan Perunding Hartanah Muslim Malaysia(PEHAM), Malaysian Institute of Property & Facility Managers (MIPFM), Association of Valuers,Property Managers, Estate Agents & Property Consultants in the Private Sector Malaysia (PEPS),Royal Institution of Surveyors Malaysia (RISM) for many years and was an EXCO PEHAM from2016 until 2021. She is currently a part-time lecturer, Supervisor in the Integrated Project forthe Certificate of the Estate Agency.

Rosniza is a well-respected speaker and trainer in the field. She has been recruiting the industrynewcomers to become the Real Estate Negotiators (REN) and inspired more than 5,000 RENssince 2015.

Property Manager

Mohamad Arif Bin Md Nor has more than 15 years of vast experience in theconstruction field and real estate. Former Technical Director at Construction Company(G6) and completed various infrastructure and building projects. He holds a Bachelor ofScience (Housing, Building and Planning)(Honors).

In the scope of building facility management, have been involved with the followingprojects:

Proposed Works to Maintain, Upgrade, Repair Vacant Units (Public & Electrical) andCommon Areas Including the Interior and Exterior Areas of Flats in the Kuala Lumpur CityHall Public Housing Area for a Period of Two (2) Years. Year (2017/A246)

Building And Area Cleaning Services (KBK) to Schools/Educational Institutions UnderThe Kelantan State Education Department, Ministry Of Education Malaysia for thecontract Period From 1 September 2020 To 30 November 2023 (39 Months) - BachokZone 3

Assistant Property Manager

Fazilah Binti Amran is a Syariah Legal Assistant of the MerssZaidi Ibrahim & Associates. She has formerly worked withMerss Zahir Razak & Co. handling both civil and syariah cases.She also served IM Global Property Consultants since 2014 to2019 as a building manager for Taman Dagang Cahaya'sproject.
